languages.text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, бывший дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, отрекся от Святой Инквизиции во имя той, что навечно покорила его душу. Став еретиком и изменником, Хейнрикс занял позицию Мастера шепотов при своей возлюбленной, чтобы оберегать ее жизнь и покой — и более не покидать ее никогда.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.
languages.original_text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, бывший дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, отрекся от Святой Инквизиции во имя той, что навечно покорила его душу. Став еретиком и изменником, Хейнрикс занял позицию Мастера шепотов при своей возлюбленной, чтобы оберегать ее жизнь и покой — и более не покидать ее никогда.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition for the name of the one who stole his heart forever more. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix took the place of Master of Whispers by his lover's side to guard her life and her rest, and to never leave her again.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition for the name of the one who stole his heart forever more. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix took the place of Master of Whispers by his lover's side to guard her life and her rest, and to never leave her again.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever stolen his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became the Master of Whispers by his lover's side to guard her life and her rest, and to never leave her again.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

languages.text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的前任审讯官，由于某个他永远心系之人的原因，背弃了神圣审判庭，成为了异端与叛徒。海因里希留在了爱人的身边，担任了低语之主的职位，守护她的生命和安宁，一刻都不曾离开。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

traits.locale_text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的前任审讯官，由于某个他永远心系之人的原因，背弃了神圣审判庭，成为了异端与叛徒。海因里希留在了爱人的身边，担任了低语之主的职位，守护她的生命和安宁，一刻都不曾离开。

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, der ehemalige Interrogator des Ordo Xenos, schwor der Heiligen Inquisition ab, um bei {mf|dem Mann zu bleiben, der|der Frau zu bleiben, die} für immer sein Herz erobert hatte. Heinrix, der Ketzer und Verräter, wurde zum Meister des Geflüsters an der Seite seiner Geliebten, um deren Leben und Rast zu beschützen, für immer.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, der ehemalige Interrogator des Ordo Xenos, schwor der Heiligen Inquisition ab, um bei {mf|dem Mann zu bleiben, der|der Frau zu bleiben, die} ihm für immer das Herz gestohlen hatte. Heinrix, der Ketzer und Verräter, wurde zum Meister des Geflüsters an der Seite seiner Geliebten, um deren Leben und Rast zu beschützen, für immer.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, ancien interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, quitta la Sainte Inquisition afin de rester aux côtés de celle qui avait su dérober la clé de son cœur. Désormais considéré comme un traître et un hérétique, il devint le maître des murmures de sa bien-aimée et s'engagea à la protéger à jamais.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, ancien interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, quitta la Sainte Inquisition afin de rester aux côtés de celle qui avait su trouver la clé de son cœur. Désormais considéré comme un traître et un hérétique, il devint le maître des murmures de sa bien-aimée et s'engagea à la protéger à jamais.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, antiguo interrogador del Ordo Xenos, renunció a la Santa Inquisición en nombre de la mujer que había conquistado su corazón para siempre. Como hereje y traidor, Heinrix se convirtió en el maestro de susurros de su amada para proteger su vida y su descanso, y jamás abandonaría su lado.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, antiguo interrogador del Ordo Xenos, renunció a la Santa Inquisición en nombre de la mujer que había robado su corazón para siempre. Como hereje y traidor, Heinrix se convirtió en el maestro de susurros de su amada para proteger su vida y su descanso, y jamás abandonaría su lado.

languages.text: 〈純血の団〉のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、その心を永遠に奪った女のために、聖なる異端審問庁と関係を断ち切った。異端の逆賊となったハインリックスは、再案の彼女の命と安息を守り、彼女のそばを二度と離れないために、囁きの主となった。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

traits.locale_text: 〈純血の団〉のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、その心を永遠に奪った女のために、聖なる異端審問庁と関係を断ち切った。異端の逆賊となったハインリックスは、恋人の命と安息を守るために彼女の傍らで囁きの主となり、二度と側を離れなかった。

languages.text: Eski Zeno Nizamı Sorgucusu Heinrix van Calox, kalbini hepten fetheden kişi uğruna Kutsal Engizisyon'dan ayrıldı. Kâfir ve hain olan Heinrix, âşığının Fısıltı Üstadı oldu. Böylece onun canını koruyup huzurunu gözetebilecek ve asla yanından ayrılmayacaktı.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, renounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of the one who had forever conquered his heart. A heretic and a traitor, Heinrix became his beloved's Master of Whispers, so that he could guard her life and her rest, and never leave her side again.

traits.locale_text: Zeno Nizamı eski Sorgucu'su Heinrix Van Calox, kalbini daimî olarak fethetmiş kişi uğruna Kutsal Engizisyon'u reddetti. Bir kâfir ve bir hain olan Heinrix, âşığının Fısıltı Üstadı oldu. Böylece onun yaşamını ve huzurunu koruyabilecek ve asla yanından ayrılmayacaktı.
